snippet: A civil liberties group on Wednesday sued the police department of a New Hampshire town for what it says is a pattern of harassing panhandlers in violation of their constitutional rights....

headline.print_headline: New Hampshire Town Sued for Harassing Panhandlers
headline.main: New Hampshire Town Sued for Harassing Panhandlers

lead_paragraph: A civil liberties group on Wednesday sued the police department of a New Hampshire town for what it says is a pattern of harassing panhandlers in violation of their constitutional rights.
